amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that the contract provisions for the Central Valley Project must be in conformity with the Act of July 2, 1956 which amended the Reclamation Projects Act of 1939; clarifies that four CALFED surface water projects are authorized as long as non-Federal fincancing is used; and makes several technical changes to the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 112-405 to make several technical and clarifying changes to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
